name: Cars (itch) (DevVictor)
description:
Welcome everybody to my game page!

This game is about avoiding cars, barriers, getting upgrade : ) This is a endless runner, you need to beat your high score! 

I'm still working on this game! I will be uploading updates. 

First update will give shop :D

Second will give challanges and levels. I think I will turn this game to something bigger, I have idea for this : D

How to play:

Everything is in game :D
